title: 25: The Memory Palace
dc:creator: A.J. Hanenburg
description: In this episode, A.J. walks us through the ancient method of loci and its modern uses. Ever see Sherlock poke his brain and information comes out? Well, the memory palace is a real thing, but it doesn't exactly work like that.
itunes:author: The Burgs & The Bees... and Graeme.
itunes:subtitle: Really, it's just a good way to remember stuff.
itunes:summary: In this episode, A.J. walks us through the ancient method of loci and its modern uses. Ever see Sherlock poke his brain and information comes out? Well, the memory palace is a real thing, but it doesn't exactly work like that.
itunes:title: 25: The Memory Palace
